title: Requisites problem with CS 320
body:
Hi guys,

Does anyone know the meaning of the rule of requisites of CS 320. On the website of course search, it shows that 

Requisites 

COMP SCI 220( or COMP SCI 301 prior to Spring 2020), COMP SCI 300, 319, graduate/professional standing…..

From my understanding, although I didn’t take the 220, 301, 300, 319 before, I am a graduate student who majors in M.S. business analytics. Therefore, I can still take this course.

Is my understanding right?

Thanks!
comments: That’s is correct in an “or” situation. Work with your faculty advisor to plan your courses.
